body_content.explanation: the process in which someone or something grows or changes and becomes more advanced:
examples: The documentary traced the development of popular music through the ages.
The region suffers from under-/over-development (= having too little/much industry).
a development project (= one to help improve industry) in Pakistan

body_content.explanation: a recent event that is the latest in a series of related events:
examples: an important development in the fuel crisis
Call me if there are any new developments.

body_content.explanation: the process of developing something new:
examples: Mr Berkowitz is in charge of product development.

body_content.explanation: an area on which new buildings are built in order to make a profit:
examples: They moved into a new housing development on the edge of town.
